SENT.plain: We report the case of febrile fatal coma in a 51-year-old man from Burkina Faso
Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) shows cerebral fat embolism
Haemoglobin electrophoresis shows probably haemoglobinopathy SC

A short review of the literature demonstrate the need to consider this complication in patients with neurological or respiratory disorders, in areas where this disease is highly prevalent, irrespective of age
It also emphasizes the diagnostic contribution of MRI and discusses the mechanism, the diagnosis as well as the difficulty of choosing the appropriate therapeutic course
